summary: THE CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE REGARDING THE TIE ROD AND DRAG LINKS, FOLLOWING THE REPAIR, THE CONSUMER NOTICED THE STEERING POSITION HAD MOVED FROM ITS ORIGINAL TO MORE A VERTICAL POSITION, THE RECREATIONAL VEHICLE WAS RETURNED TO THE DEALER TO REPOSITION THE STEERING WHEEL.  MONTHS LATER CONSUMER NOTICED THE RIGHT FRONT TIRE HAD WORN INTO THE WEAR BARS ON THE OUTER RIM OF THE TIRE, IT WAS DETERMINED BOTH TIRES WERE DAMAGED AND THE TOTAL TOE WAS 1.05 INCHES WHICH WAS MORE THAN ALLOWABLE.   *PH    *JB
